title: Cosmopolitan Netherlands Stay in Historic Utrecht
description: Experience the perfect combination of heritage and cosmopolitan living in centuries-old Utrecht, situated between Rotterdam and Amsterdam (just a 30-minute train ride away). At Crowne Plaza Utrecht - Central Station, an IHG Hotel, you'll be within easy reach of the city's classic cobblestoned streets, lined with vintage bookstores, boutiques and endless coffee stops - as well as Utrecht Centraal station and the attractions of the surrounding Hoog Catharijne mall.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Utrecht - Central Station, an IHG Hotel
